nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Heroes of the Galaxy

Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Heroes of the Galaxy is a Level 2 DK Readers title based on the film Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It was written by Ruth Amos and published by Dorling Kindersley on December 15, 2017.

This 48-page reader aimed at helping young readers develop their reading skills focuses on introducing them to the characters, vehicles, and locations from the highly anticipated new film, Star Wars: The Last Jedi!
